tmdb.title: RRR
tmdb.overview: A fictional history of two legendary revolutionaries' journey away from home before they began fighting for their country in the 1920s.

metadata.title: Full Video: Naatu Naatu Song (Telugu) | RRR Songs | NTR,Ram Charan | MM Keeravaani | SS Rajamouli
metadata.description:
T-Series Telugu presents  #NaatuNaatu Full Video Song from #RRR Telugu Movie. An M.M.Keeravaani Musical. Sung by Rahul Sipligunj & Kaala Bhairava.

#RRRMovie #NaatuNaatuSong #RRRSongs #NTR #RamCharan #MMKeeravaani #SSRajamouli 
#NaatuNaatuFullVideoSong 
------------------------------------------ 
Connect with T-Series Telugu: 👉 http://bit.ly/SubscribeToTseriesTelugu
------------------------------------------
Song Name: NAATU NAATU
Music Director:  M. M. Keeravaani
Lyricist: Chandrabose
Singers: Rahul Sipligunj, Kaala Bhairava
Choreography by:  Prem Rakshith
Programmed by: G. Jeevan Babu, Siddharth S 
Mixed and Mastered by: G. Jeevan Babu 
Recorded at JB Studios. 
Lyric Video by:  Walls And Trends
Movie: RRR 
Cast: NTR, Ram Charan, Ajay Devgn, Alia Bhatt, Olivia Morris, Samuthirakani, Alison Doody, Ray Stevenson 
Screenplay & Direction: S.S. Rajamouli 
Presented by: D. Parvathi 
Producer: DVV Danayya 
Banner: DVV Entertainment 
Story: V. Vijayendra Prasad 
DOP: K.K. Senthil Kumar 
Production Designer: Sabu Cyril 
Music Composer: M.M. Keeravaani 
VFX Supervision: V Srinivas Mohan 
Editor: Sreekar Prasad 
Costume Designer: Rama Rajamouli 
Telugu Dialogues: Sai Madhav Burra 
Hindi Dialogues: Riya Mukherjee 
Tamil Dialogues: Madan Karky 
Kannada Dialogues: Varadaraju Chikkaballapura 
Malayalam Dialogues: Gopala Krishnan 
North India Distribution: Pen Studios and Dr. Jayantilal Gada (Pen Studios) 
Tamilnadu Distribution: Lyca Productions 
Branding & Marketing: Walls and Trends
DI: Annapurna Studios
Colorist: Shiva Kumar BVR
Music Label : Lahari Music & T Series
--------
♪Full Song Available on♪ 
JioSaavn: https://bit.ly/NaatuNaatu-RRR-Telugu-JioSaavn

influential_comments.author: @crazygirli8511

influential_comments.author: @TheStreak_20
influential_comments.comment: ఈ M.M. కీరవాణి మాస్టర్ పీస్ అద్భుతంగా ఉంది, నేను ఈ పాటను మలయాళం, తమిళం, హిందీ, కన్నడ లేదా తెలుగు ఇలా ప్రతి భాషలో వింటాను... ప్రకంపనలు ఒకేలా ఉన్నాయి... ఈ పాట ప్రతి భాషలో సంచలనం...

influential_comments.author: @phoenixadhikari
influential_comments.comment:
We, at Nepal, watched this movie in Hindi dubbed version. We so wish we could watch this song (at least) in the original Telugu. This version is far better than Hindi dubbing. Telugu is such a beautiful language.
Edit: Thank you my Telugu-speaking friends. We are all united by the love for the language. And for the love of "Naatu".
